Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to toppled enemies by 100%-150%.

Generic.Name: Multi-Edge
Generic.Caption: Create countless ether balls to attack the enemy.
Generic.Enhance: Increases Affinity by 60-100 when using a Special.

Generic.Name: Flash Barrel
Generic.Caption: Float your weapon and launch a giant ether ball.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to toppled enemies by 100%-150%.

Generic.Name: Aerial Shield
Generic.Caption: A mid-air weapon drops down at high speed, attacking the enemy.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt from the front by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Sword Dance
Generic.Caption: A two-stage attack where you slash then attack with blade sheathed.
Generic.Enhance: Adds a 60%-100% chance of dealing a guard-annulling attack.

Generic.Name: Flash Bomb
Generic.Caption: Throw a condensed ball of ether which explodes.
Generic.Enhance: Absorbs 60%-100% of critical damage dealt as HP.

Generic.Name: Thermal Payload
Generic.Caption: Knuckle Claws fly out matching your movements.
Generic.Enhance: Spawns a small HP Potion on hit, with a 60%-100% chance to spawn 2.

Generic.Name: Ripple Drive
Generic.Caption: Control ether to attack the enemy and heal allies.
Generic.Enhance: When landing a hit, restores 30%-50% of damage dealt to the whole party.

Generic.Name: Falling Axe
Generic.Caption: Attack by dropping down an ether blade from above.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to toppled enemies by 100%-150%.

Generic.Name: Boomerang Spear
Generic.Caption: Spin your weapon at high speed, dealing countless slash attacks.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to insects by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Aerial Trigger
Generic.Caption: Jump into the air and fire a shot with an elemental attribute.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to toppled enemies by 100%-150%.

Generic.Name: Smash Circle
Generic.Caption: Attack by throwing your weapon like a disc.
Generic.Enhance: Increases aggro drawn from Specials by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Triple Edge
Generic.Caption: Slash at the enemy repeatedly, not allowing them chance to defend.
Generic.Enhance: Increases aggro drawn from Specials by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Grenade Throw
Generic.Caption: Throw a condensed ball of ether which explodes.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to toppled enemies by 100%-150%.

Generic.Name: Assault Rush
Generic.Caption: Charge forward in an instant and overwhelm the enemy with a flurry.
Generic.Enhance: Absorbs 60%-100% of critical damage dealt as HP.

Generic.Name: Ground Charge
Generic.Caption: Smash your weapon into the ground and charge into the enemy.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to toppled enemies by 100%-150%.

Generic.Name: Beam Halberd
Generic.Caption: Fill your weapon with ether and shoot it out as a laser.
Generic.Enhance: Adds a 60%-100% chance of dealing a guard-annulling attack.

Generic.Name: Spinning Laser
Generic.Caption: Spin while emitting a laser, to mow down the enemy.
Generic.Enhance: Adds a 60%-100% chance of dealing a guard-annulling attack.

Generic.Name: Turn Strike
Generic.Caption: Throw your weapon ahead and by spinning it, attack enemies in range.
Generic.Enhance: Increases aggro drawn from Specials by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Counter Spin
Generic.Caption: After throwing the scabbard from your left hand, perform a slash attack.
Generic.Enhance: Increases aggro drawn from Specials by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Wrecking Ball
Generic.Caption: Hit the ball with your fist so it hits the enemy multiple times.
Generic.Enhance: Spawns a small HP Potion on hit, with a 60%-100% chance to spawn 2.

Generic.Name: Head Shaker
Generic.Caption: Hit the ground with both fists to attack the enemy with a powerful shockwave.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to launched enemies by 100%-150%.

Generic.Name: Megaslash
Generic.Caption: After random slash attacks, perform a powerful spinning slash.
Generic.Enhance: Increases critical damage by 25%-85%.

Generic.Name: Trident Buster
Generic.Caption: Jump up and throw your Megalance down to the side.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to toppled enemies by 100%-150%.

Generic.Name: Blink Bullet
Generic.Caption: Jump up into the air and launch a homing missile.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt by 100%-150% when HP is 90% or higher.

Generic.Name: Drum Roll
Generic.Caption: Hit the ground with all your might, attacking with a shockwave.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to launched enemies by 100%-150%.

Generic.Name: Rage Cutter
Generic.Caption: Heighten concentration and perform a triple slash attack.
Generic.Enhance: Increases aggro drawn from Specials by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Power Effect
Generic.Caption: Unleash condensed ether above the head to attack.
Generic.Enhance: When landing a hit, restores 30%-50% of damage dealt to the whole party.

Generic.Name: Leg Blast
Generic.Caption: Combo move with a single punch followed by a sharp kick.
Generic.Enhance: Absorbs 60%-100% of critical damage dealt as HP.

Generic.Name: Dual Fang
Generic.Caption: Shoot out lasers from the rings floating on both sides.
Generic.Enhance: When landing a hit, restores 30%-50% of damage dealt to the whole party.

Generic.Name: Axe Throw
Generic.Caption: Slash up enemies in range while spinning your weapon.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to aquatic organisms by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Splash Lance
Generic.Caption: Create countless ether balls to attack the enemy.
Generic.Enhance: Reduces 20%-40% of aggro toward user upon landing a hit.

Generic.Name: Swing Cannon
Generic.Caption: Float your weapon and mow down all enemies within range with a laser.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt by 100%-150% when HP is 90% or higher.

Generic.Name: Shield Charge
Generic.Caption: Charge in with your shield and perform a follow-on attack.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt from the front by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Multi-Raid
Generic.Caption: Attack with a shockwave and repeated slashes of your blade.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to enemies targeting user by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Grim Sphere
Generic.Caption: Attack by repeatedly bashing your enemy with the ball.
Generic.Enhance: When landing a hit, restores 30%-50% of damage dealt to the whole party.

Generic.Name: Executioner
Generic.Caption: Unleash a dive kick and cause an ether explosion.
Generic.Enhance: When landing a hit, restores 30%-50% of damage dealt to the whole party.

Generic.Name: War Swing
Generic.Caption: Swing your weapon with all your might to attack enemies in range.
Generic.Enhance: Adds a 60%-100% chance of dealing a guard-annulling attack.

Generic.Name: Hair Trigger
Generic.Caption: Pierce the ground with your lance tip to release a shockwave.
Generic.Enhance: Reduces 20%-40% of aggro toward user upon landing a hit.

Generic.Name: Beam Bomber
Generic.Caption: Emit a laser from your overcharged weapon.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt by 100%-150% when HP is 90% or higher.

Generic.Name: Wheel Crash
Generic.Caption: Throw a hammer so it spins at high speed and hits the enemy.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt from the front by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Magnum Edge
Generic.Caption: Stomp on the ground, and perform a quick draw cut with all your might.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to enemies targeting user by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Violent Swing
Generic.Caption: Swing the ball around, as if on a chain, to hit enemies repeatedly.
Generic.Enhance: When landing a hit, restores 30%-50% of damage dealt to the whole party.

Generic.Name: Knuckle Purge
Generic.Caption: Daze the enemy with a tackle then shoot your weapon.
Generic.Enhance: Spawns a small HP Potion on hit, with a 60%-100% chance to spawn 2.

Generic.Name: Flying Cutter
Generic.Caption: Throw your weapon and adjust its path to attack the enemy.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to beasts by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Spiral Spear
Generic.Caption: Throw your weapon so it spins round, hitting any enemy in range.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt by 100%-150% when HP is 90% or higher.

Generic.Name: Beam Barrage
Generic.Caption: Emit a laser from your overcharged weapon.
Generic.Enhance: Adds a 60%-100% chance of dealing a guard-annulling attack.

Generic.Name: Hammer Rush
Generic.Caption: After swinging your weapon repeatedly, finish off with a rising attack.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt by 100%-150% when HP is 30% or less.

Generic.Name: Air Slash
Generic.Caption: Perform a quick draw in the air then release a massive slash attack.
Generic.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to enemies targeting user by 60%-100%.

Generic.Name: Rumble Sphere
Generic.Caption: The ball bashes into the enemy multiple times, damaging them.
Generic.Enhance: Spawns a small HP Potion on hit, with a 60%-100% chance to spawn 2.

Generic.Name: Flash Blow
Generic.Caption: Combo attack with a forward somersault followed by a flying kick.
Generic.Enhance: When landing a hit, restores 30%-50% of damage dealt to the whole party.

Generic.Name: Screw Edge
Generic.Caption: Attack repeatedly using the ring held in the mouth.
Generic.Enhance: Spawns a small HP Potion on hit, with a 60%-100% chance to spawn 2.

T-elos.Name: ECHIDNA
T-elos.Caption: Deliver a slashing attack, and follow it up with a powerful kick.

T-elos.Name: MAGDALENE 16
T-elos.Caption: Deliver a whirling blow followed by a wild volley of shots.
T-elos.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to higher-level enemies by 60%-100%.

T-elos.Name: T-SKYLLA
T-elos.Caption: Unleash a mid-air slash and then unload your firearm at the enemy.
T-elos.Enhance: Adds a 60%-100% chance of dealing a guard-annulling attack.

Poppibuster.Name: Buster Cyclone
Poppibuster.Caption: Transform your weapon into knuckle claws and barrel into the enemy.
Poppibuster.Enhance: Increases aggro drawn from Specials by 60%-100%.

Poppibuster.Name: Buster Cannon
Poppibuster.Caption: Transform your weapon into a cannon and unload it into the enemy.
Poppibuster.Enhance: Adds a 60%-100% chance of dealing a guard-annulling attack.

Poppibuster.Name: Buster Mirage
Poppibuster.Caption: Unleash the combined power of Poppi Mk. II and Poppibuster on the enemy.
Poppibuster.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to enemies targeting user by 60%-100%.

Shulk.Name: Monado Purge
Shulk.Caption: Brandish the Monado to generate a mid-air shockwave.
Shulk.Enhance: 60%-100% chance to remove awakened status from enemy when using Special.

Shulk.Name: Monado Cyclone
Shulk.Caption: Perform a rising spin to damage enemies surrounding you.

Shulk.Name: Monado Buster
Shulk.Caption: A powerful slash using the true power of the Monado.
Shulk.Enhance: Adds a 60%-100% chance of dealing a guard-annulling attack.

Fiora.Name: Hidden Thorn
Fiora.Caption: Quickly close in on the enemy and dice them into submission.
Fiora.Enhance: Spawns a small HP Potion on hit, with a 60%-100% chance to spawn 2.

Fiora.Name: Power Smash
Fiora.Caption: Charge up power, then unleash it in a series of airborne spinning attacks.
Fiora.Enhance: Absorbs 60%-100% of critical damage dealt as HP.

Fiora.Name: Lacerate
Fiora.Caption: Deliver a rising attack, followed up with a strong downward blow.
Fiora.Enhance: When landing a hit, restores 30%-50% of damage dealt to the whole party.

Corvin.Name: Fuga Daemonum
Corvin.Caption: Slash foes in the surrounding area with blades made of light.
Corvin.Enhance: When landing a hit, restores 6%-10% of damage dealt to the whole party.

Corvin.Name: Lacerna Noctis
Corvin.Caption: Lead with a mighty cleaving blow, then follow-up with a cape swipe.
Corvin.Enhance: On using Special, has 60%-100% chance to purge enemy rage status.

Corvin.Name: Ex Tenebris Lux
Corvin.Caption: A dual-sword combo assault using the power of Durandal.
Corvin.Enhance: On Special, Driver receives afterimage, evading next 4-6 attack(s).

Crossette.Name: Go! Great Star!
Crossette.Caption: Cram the Bitball full of ether, then spin it and make it blow up.
Crossette.Enhance: Spawns a small HP Potion on hit, with a 60%-100% chance to spawn 2.

Crossette.Name: Go! Shooting Star!
Crossette.Caption: Set off a series of ether explosions, capped with one last big one.
Crossette.Enhance: When landing a hit, restores 30%-50% of damage dealt to the whole party.

Crossette.Name: Go! Lucky Star!
Crossette.Caption: Set up the Bitball, then spike it for a truly giant boom.
Crossette.Enhance: Adds a 60%-100% chance of dealing a guard-annulling attack.

Elma.Name: Sliding Slinger
Elma.Caption: Slide forward while concentrating fire on the enemy.
Elma.Enhance: Increases damage dealt to higher-level enemies by 60%-100%.

Elma.Name: Hundred Shells
Elma.Caption: Swing your swords downward to send shockwaves flying at your foes.
Elma.Enhance: Increases damage dealt from the back by 100%-150%.

Elma.Name: Violent Streak
Elma.Caption: Blast all enemies in the vicinity with an unstoppable barrage of fire.
